*div1 type="summary"* *p*P. T. Dimmitt to J. Allcorn, June 17, 1827. Asking intervention to commute a sentence.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Sant. Antonia*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="06-17-1827">17th June 1827*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Friend*/p*
*p*Sir I have to molest you again which I have no doubt will not be of much Interest you, *person_mentioned*Mr. Miller*/person_mentioned* is a Poor unfortunate man and has a large *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*and from his misconduct on *location_mentioned*Trinity */location_mentioned*was Sentanced to leave the *location_mentioned*Contrey */location_mentioned*or pay One hundred Dollars find and from the excessive find the*person_mentioned* Alcaldes on the *location_mentioned*Trinity*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* imposed, or the sentance of leaving the *location_mentioned*cuntrey */location_mentioned*was Too severe for what he was charged with that of rescuing a *person_mentioned*prisinor */person_mentioned*from the *person_mentioned*constables */person_mentioned*he maid application to the *person_mentioned*Govonor */person_mentioned*and he has writting to *person_mentioned*Col. Austin*/person_mentioned* on the subject—Aliso the *person_mentioned*Govonor */person_mentioned*showed me a Decree passed *date_mentioned n="10-18-1825">1825 the 18 Oct*/date_mentioned*. gowing as follows that no *person_mentioned*alcalde */person_mentioned*or *person_mentioned*alcaldes */person_mentioned*has power to sentance and put in execution fines corporal punsihment or rules without first laying before the *person_mentioned*Govonor of the *location_mentioned*state*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* or the *person_mentioned*tribunal of the *location_mentioned*state*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*, the accused and charges etc etc and being confirmed by the high[es]t *person_mentioned*tribunale of the *location_mentioned*state*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* before the *person_mentioned*accused */person_mentioned*can be sentance, you will oblige your *person_mentioned*friend */person_mentioned*so much as to attend to this Poor unfortunate man for the sake of his *person_mentioned*familey */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*children*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Your letter has been recd and your wished to Borrow some money Sr I have embarked on another speculation since my arivall at *location_mentioned*home*/location_mentioned* but I shall be in your place in *date_mentioned n="09-xx-1827">September */date_mentioned*and you then can get 5O. or 100 Dollars if you want*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*DIMMITT*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*N B you will not forget my *location_mentioned*land */location_mentioned*if thare is aney to be sold write on the return mail I forgot pay you for the labour I got which is near in the *location_mentioned*Brassos*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*M. J. Allcorn*/person_mentioned* en *location_mentioned*Sant Filipi*/location_mentioned* The politeness of *person_mentioned*Mr. Miller*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
